comments:
I20060228-1207

I was playing around with the history view (toggling date display and filtering of local vs. remote revisions). I once pressed <return> to display the revision of a file. Found a couple of the following in the log, but nothing seemed wrong in the UI.

Similar: 

- filter the history view so nothing is displayed
- in the view, open the context menu and choose 'Open'
- get the exception below

< expected behavior: the context menu actions should be disabled when there is no selection

The steps for the CCE:

- select a date group label in the history view
- press <return>
Fixed CCE of categories and disabled open/compare when there are no revisions present in the table.
